name: One Plus 3T
description: The OnePlus 3T stays true to our Never Settle approach. Impressive specs mean nothing if you don’t have a great experience every time you pick up your phone. The OnePlus 3T delivers the best user experience, thanks to the latest hardware upgrades and carefully tested software enhancements. It was developed with care, craftsmanship and in collaboration with our community.

specs.CPU: Qualcomm® Snapdragon™ 821 Quad Core, Kryo™ 2x 2.35 GHz, 2x 1.6 GHz
specs.Sensors: Fingerprint sensor, Hall sensor, Accelerometor, Gyroscope, Proximity sensor, Ambient light sensor, Electronic Compass
specs.Ports: USB 2.0, Type-C, Dual nano-SIM slot, 3.5 mm audio jack
